data.name: Cube Paste
data.detailed_description:
Welcome in Cube Paste


Cube Paste is a first person shooter in massive multiplayer match base on lage maps, advanced gun customization and sandbox environment to let you and your firend experience intense combat.

Advance Gun Customization


In Cube Paste you can experience and enjoy a very in-depth view of your loadout, prepare youself, upgrade and expand your fire power throught the freedom of the character and gun customization !

Large scale Environment

Massive Multiplayer Match


Get ready to fight with your team throught the hell of warfare with 64 player per team for a total of 128 player fighting for the victory !
data.about_the_game:
Welcome in Cube Paste


Cube Paste is a first person shooter in massive multiplayer match base on lage maps, advanced gun customization and sandbox environment to let you and your firend experience intense combat.

Advance Gun Customization


In Cube Paste you can experience and enjoy a very in-depth view of your loadout, prepare youself, upgrade and expand your fire power throught the freedom of the character and gun customization !

Large scale Environment

Massive Multiplayer Match


Get ready to fight with your team throught the hell of warfare with 64 player per team for a total of 128 player fighting for the victory !
data.short_description: Cube Paste is a FPS in large scale maps using voxel art style in high details environments and high customisation for your weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit and better
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4XXX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4XXX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6Go
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
